sqlMap.select:
SELECT /* [KnowledgeMonitorStatistics_SqlMap.xml] collpack.knowledgemonitor.dao.KnowledgeMonitorStatistics.listChartBySearchCondition */ SUBSTR(YMD,1,4)||'.'||SUBSTR(YMD,5,2) TO_CHAR(YMD,'yyyy.mm.dd') YMD , PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, ALL_DOC_COUNT FROM ( SELECT YMD , PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT SUM(PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT) OVER (ORDER BY YMD) PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT , ALL_DOC_COUNT SUM(ALL_DOC_COUNT) OVER (ORDER BY YMD) ALL_DOC_COUNT FROM ( SELECT YEAR_MONTH WEEK_START_DATE YMD , SUM(PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT) PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT , SUM(PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT + CLOSED_DOC_COUNT) ALL_DOC_COUNT FROM IKEP4_KN_STATISTICS WHERE PORTAL_ID = #portalId# MODULE_CODE IN #moduleCodeArray[]# 1 = 2
YEAR_MONTH BETWEEN #fromYear#||#fromMonth# AND #toYear#||#toMonth# WEEK_START_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#fromDate#,'yyyy.mm.dd') AND TO_DATE(#toDate#,'yyyy.mm.dd')
YEAR_MONTH BETWEEN '1900'||'01' AND #toYear#||#toMonth# WEEK_START_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('1900-01-01','yyyy.mm.dd') AND TO_DATE(#toDate#,'yyyy.mm.dd')
GROUP BY YEAR_MONTH WEEK_START_DATE ) )
YMD BETWEEN #fromYear#||#fromMonth# AND #toYear#||#toMonth# YMD BETWEEN TO_DATE(#fromDate#,'yyyy.mm.dd') AND TO_DATE(#toDate#,'yyyy.mm.dd')
ORDER BY YMD

SELECT /* [KnowledgeMonitorStatistics_SqlMap.xml] collpack.knowledgemonitor.dao.KnowledgeMonitorStatistics.listBySearchCondition */ SUBSTR(YMD,1,4)||'.'||SUBSTR(YMD,5,2) YMD TO_CHAR(YMD,'yyyy.mm.dd')||' ~ '||TO_CHAR(YMD + 6,'yyyy.mm.dd') YMD , NVL(PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0) PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT , NVL(ALL_DOC_COUNT, 0) ALL_DOC_COUNT
, NVL(BD_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0) BD_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, NVL(BD_ALL_DOC_COUNT, 0) BD_ALL_DOC_COUNT , NVL(CF_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0) CF_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, NVL(CF_ALL_DOC_COUNT, 0) CF_ALL_DOC_COUNT , NVL(CV_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0) CV_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, NVL(CV_ALL_DOC_COUNT, 0) CV_ALL_DOC_COUNT , NVL(FR_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0) FR_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, NVL(FR_ALL_DOC_COUNT, 0) FR_ALL_DOC_COUNT , NVL(ID_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0) ID_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, NVL(ID_ALL_DOC_COUNT, 0) ID_ALL_DOC_COUNT , NVL(QA_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0) QA_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, NVL(QA_ALL_DOC_COUNT, 0) QA_ALL_DOC_COUNT , NVL(SB_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0) SB_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, NVL(SB_ALL_DOC_COUNT, 0) SB_ALL_DOC_COUNT , NVL(WM_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0) WM_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, NVL(WM_ALL_DOC_COUNT, 0) WM_ALL_DOC_COUNT , NVL(WS_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0) WS_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, NVL(WS_ALL_DOC_COUNT, 0) WS_ALL_DOC_COUNT
, 0 BD_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0 BD_ALL_DOC_COUNT , 0 CF_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0 CF_ALL_DOC_COUNT , 0 CV_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0 CV_ALL_DOC_COUNT , 0 FR_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0 FR_ALL_DOC_COUNT , 0 ID_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0 ID_ALL_DOC_COUNT , 0 QA_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0 QA_ALL_DOC_COUNT , 0 SB_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0 SB_ALL_DOC_COUNT , 0 WM_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0 WM_ALL_DOC_COUNT , 0 WS_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0 WS_ALL_DOC_COUNT
FROM ( SELECT YMD , PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT SUM(PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT) OVER (ORDER BY YMD) PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT , ALL_DOC_COUNT SUM(ALL_DOC_COUNT) OVER (ORDER BY YMD) ALL_DOC_COUNT
, BD_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, BD_ALL_DOC_COUNT SUM(BD_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT) OVER (ORDER BY YMD) BD_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, SUM(BD_ALL_DOC_COUNT) OVER (ORDER BY YMD) BD_ALL_DOC_COUNT
CF_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, CF_ALL_DOC_COUNT SUM(CF_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT) OVER (ORDER BY YMD) CF_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, SUM(CF_ALL_DOC_COUNT) OVER (ORDER BY YMD) CF_ALL_DOC_COUNT
CV_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, CV_ALL_DOC_COUNT SUM(CV_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT) OVER (ORDER BY YMD) CV_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, SUM(CV_ALL_DOC_COUNT) OVER (ORDER BY YMD) CV_ALL_DOC_COUNT
FR_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, FR_ALL_DOC_COUNT SUM(FR_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT) OVER (ORDER BY YMD) FR_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, SUM(FR_ALL_DOC_COUNT) OVER (ORDER BY YMD) FR_ALL_DOC_COUNT
ID_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, ID_ALL_DOC_COUNT SUM(ID_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT) OVER (ORDER BY YMD) ID_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, SUM(ID_ALL_DOC_COUNT) OVER (ORDER BY YMD) ID_ALL_DOC_COUNT
QA_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, QA_ALL_DOC_COUNT SUM(QA_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT) OVER (ORDER BY YMD) QA_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, SUM(QA_ALL_DOC_COUNT) OVER (ORDER BY YMD) QA_ALL_DOC_COUNT
SB_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, SB_ALL_DOC_COUNT SUM(SB_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT) OVER (ORDER BY YMD) SB_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, SUM(SB_ALL_DOC_COUNT) OVER (ORDER BY YMD) SB_ALL_DOC_COUNT
WM_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, WM_ALL_DOC_COUNT SUM(WM_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT) OVER (ORDER BY YMD) WM_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, SUM(WM_ALL_DOC_COUNT) OVER (ORDER BY YMD) WM_ALL_DOC_COUNT
WS_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, WS_ALL_DOC_COUNT SUM(WS_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT) OVER (ORDER BY YMD) WS_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, SUM(WS_ALL_DOC_COUNT) OVER (ORDER BY YMD) WS_ALL_DOC_COUNT
FROM ( SELECT YEAR_MONTH WEEK_START_DATE YMD , SUM(PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT) PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT , SUM(PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT + CLOSED_DOC_COUNT) ALL_DOC_COUNT
, SUM(DECODE(MODULE_CODE, #moduleCodeArray[]#, PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT)) BD_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT ID_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT FR_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT CF_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT WM_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT CV_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT QA_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT WS_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT SB_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT
, SUM(DECODE(MODULE_CODE, #moduleCodeArray[]#, PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT + CLOSED_DOC_COUNT)) BD_ALL_DOC_COUNT ID_ALL_DOC_COUNT FR_ALL_DOC_COUNT CF_ALL_DOC_COUNT WM_ALL_DOC_COUNT CV_ALL_DOC_COUNT QA_ALL_DOC_COUNT WS_ALL_DOC_COUNT SB_ALL_DOC_COUNT
FROM IKEP4_KN_STATISTICS WHERE PORTAL_ID = #portalId# MODULE_CODE IN #moduleCodeArray[]# 1 = 2
YEAR_MONTH BETWEEN #fromYear#||#fromMonth# AND #toYear#||#toMonth# WEEK_START_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#fromDate#,'yyyy.mm.dd') AND TO_DATE(#toDate#,'yyyy.mm.dd')
YEAR_MONTH BETWEEN '1900'||'01' AND #toYear#||#toMonth# WEEK_START_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('1900-01-01','yyyy.mm.dd') AND TO_DATE(#toDate#,'yyyy.mm.dd')
GROUP BY YEAR_MONTH WEEK_START_DATE ) )
YMD BETWEEN #fromYear#||#fromMonth# AND #toYear#||#toMonth# YMD BETWEEN TO_DATE(#fromDate#,'yyyy.mm.dd') AND TO_DATE(#toDate#,'yyyy.mm.dd')
SELECT #sumText# YMD , NVL(PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0) PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT , NVL(ALL_DOC_COUNT, 0) ALL_DOC_COUNT
, NVL(BD_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0) BD_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, NVL(BD_ALL_DOC_COUNT, 0) BD_ALL_DOC_COUNT , NVL(ID_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0) ID_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, NVL(ID_ALL_DOC_COUNT, 0) ID_ALL_DOC_COUNT , NVL(FR_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0) FR_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, NVL(FR_ALL_DOC_COUNT, 0) FR_ALL_DOC_COUNT , NVL(CF_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0) CF_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, NVL(CF_ALL_DOC_COUNT, 0) CF_ALL_DOC_COUNT , NVL(WM_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0) WM_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, NVL(WM_ALL_DOC_COUNT, 0) WM_ALL_DOC_COUNT , NVL(CV_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0) CV_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, NVL(CV_ALL_DOC_COUNT, 0) CV_ALL_DOC_COUNT , NVL(QA_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0) QA_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, NVL(QA_ALL_DOC_COUNT, 0) QA_ALL_DOC_COUNT , NVL(WS_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0) WS_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, NVL(WS_ALL_DOC_COUNT, 0) WS_ALL_DOC_COUNT , NVL(SB_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0) SB_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, NVL(SB_ALL_DOC_COUNT, 0) SB_ALL_DOC_COUNT
, 0 BD_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0 BD_ALL_DOC_COUNT , 0 ID_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0 ID_ALL_DOC_COUNT , 0 FR_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0 FR_ALL_DOC_COUNT , 0 CF_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0 CF_ALL_DOC_COUNT , 0 WM_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0 WM_ALL_DOC_COUNT , 0 CV_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0 CV_ALL_DOC_COUNT , 0 QA_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0 QA_ALL_DOC_COUNT , 0 WS_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0 WS_ALL_DOC_COUNT , 0 SB_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, 0 SB_ALL_DOC_COUNT
FROM ( SELECT SUM(PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT) PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT , SUM(PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT + CLOSED_DOC_COUNT) ALL_DOC_COUNT
, SUM(DECODE(MODULE_CODE, #moduleCodeArray[]#, PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT)) BD_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT ID_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT FR_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT CF_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT WM_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT CV_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT QA_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT WS_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT SB_PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT , SUM(DECODE(MODULE_CODE, #moduleCodeArray[]#, PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT + CLOSED_DOC_COUNT)) BD_ALL_DOC_COUNT ID_ALL_DOC_COUNT FR_ALL_DOC_COUNT CF_ALL_DOC_COUNT WM_ALL_DOC_COUNT CV_ALL_DOC_COUNT QA_ALL_DOC_COUNT WS_ALL_DOC_COUNT SB_ALL_DOC_COUNT
FROM IKEP4_KN_STATISTICS WHERE PORTAL_ID = #portalId# MODULE_CODE IN #moduleCodeArray[]# 1 = 2 YEAR_MONTH BETWEEN #fromYear#||#fromMonth# AND #toYear#||#toMonth# WEEK_START_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#fromDate#,'yyyy.mm.dd') AND TO_DATE(#toDate#,'yyyy.mm.dd') )
ORDER BY 1
sqlMap.sql: PORTAL_ID , MODULE_CODE , REGIST_DATE , PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT , CLOSED_DOC_COUNT , YEAR_MONTH , WEEK_START_DATE
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT /* [KnowledgeMonitorStatistics_SqlMap.xml] collpack.knowledgemonitor.dao.KnowledgeMonitorStatistics.batchGatherBBS */ INTO IKEP4_KN_STATISTICS ()
SELECT BOARD.PORTAL_ID PORTAL_ID , 'BD' MODULE_CODE , SYSDATE - 1 REGIST_DATE , NVL(SUM(DECODE(BOARD.READ_PERMISSION, 1, 1, 0)), 0) PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(BOARD.READ_PERMISSION, 1, 0, 1)), 0) CLOSED_DOC_COUNT , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'yyyymm') YEAR_MONTH , NEXT_DAY(TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1 - 7, '일') WEEK_START_DATE FROM IKEP4_BD_ITEM ITEM JOIN IKEP4_BD_BOARD BOARD USING (BOARD_ID) JOIN IKEP4_KN_MODULE MODULE ON MODULE.PORTAL_ID = BOARD.PORTAL_ID AND MODULE.MODULE_CODE = 'BD' AND MODULE.IS_USAGE = 1 WHERE ITEM.REGIST_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1 AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND ITEM.ITEM_DELETE = 0 GROUP BY BOARD.PORTAL_ID

INSERT /* [KnowledgeMonitorStatistics_SqlMap.xml] collpack.knowledgemonitor.dao.KnowledgeMonitorStatistics.batchGatherWorkSpace */ INTO IKEP4_KN_STATISTICS ()
SELECT BOARD.PORTAL_ID PORTAL_ID , 'WS' MODULE_CODE , SYSDATE - 1 REGIST_DATE , NVL(SUM(DECODE(ITEM.FOLLOW_BOARD_PERMISSION, 1, DECODE(BOARD.READ_PERMISSION, 1, 1, 0) , 0, DECODE(ITEM.READ_PERMISSION, 1, 1, 0))), 0) PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(ITEM.FOLLOW_BOARD_PERMISSION, 1, DECODE(BOARD.READ_PERMISSION, 1, 0, 1) , 0, DECODE(ITEM.READ_PERMISSION, 1, 0, 1))), 0) CLOSED_DOC_COUNT , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'yyyymm') YEAR_MONTH , NEXT_DAY(TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1 - 7, '일') WEEK_START_DATE FROM IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM ITEM JOIN IKEP4_WS_BD_BOARD BOARD USING (BOARD_ID) JOIN IKEP4_KN_MODULE MODULE ON MODULE.PORTAL_ID = BOARD.PORTAL_ID AND MODULE.MODULE_CODE = 'WS' AND MODULE.IS_USAGE = 1 WHERE ITEM.REGIST_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1 AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND ITEM.ITEM_DELETE = 0 GROUP BY BOARD.PORTAL_ID

INSERT /* [KnowledgeMonitorStatistics_SqlMap.xml] collpack.knowledgemonitor.dao.KnowledgeMonitorStatistics.batchGatherCafe */ INTO IKEP4_KN_STATISTICS ()
SELECT BOARD.PORTAL_ID PORTAL_ID , 'CF' MODULE_CODE , SYSDATE - 1 REGIST_DATE , NVL(SUM(DECODE(BOARD.READ_PERMISSION, 1, 1, 0)), 0) PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(BOARD.READ_PERMISSION, 1, 0, 1)), 0) CLOSED_DOC_COUNT , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'yyyymm') YEAR_MONTH , NEXT_DAY(TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1 - 7, '일') WEEK_START_DATE FROM IKEP4_CF_BD_ITEM ITEM JOIN IKEP4_CF_BD_BOARD BOARD USING (BOARD_ID) JOIN IKEP4_KN_MODULE MODULE ON MODULE.PORTAL_ID = BOARD.PORTAL_ID AND MODULE.MODULE_CODE = 'CF' AND MODULE.IS_USAGE = 1 WHERE ITEM.REGIST_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1 AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND ITEM.ITEM_DELETE = 0 GROUP BY BOARD.PORTAL_ID

INSERT /* [KnowledgeMonitorStatistics_SqlMap.xml] collpack.knowledgemonitor.dao.KnowledgeMonitorStatistics.batchGatherWorkManual */ INTO IKEP4_KN_STATISTICS ()
SELECT BOARD.PORTAL_ID PORTAL_ID , 'WM' MODULE_CODE , SYSDATE - 1 REGIST_DATE , NVL(SUM(DECODE(BOARD.READ_PERMISSION, 1, 1, 0)), 0) PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(BOARD.READ_PERMISSION, 1, 0, 1)), 0) CLOSED_DOC_COUNT , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'yyyymm') YEAR_MONTH , NEXT_DAY(TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1 - 7, '일') WEEK_START_DATE FROM IKEP4_WM_MANUAL ITEM JOIN IKEP4_WM_CATEGORY BOARD USING (CATEGORY_ID) JOIN IKEP4_KN_MODULE MODULE ON MODULE.PORTAL_ID = BOARD.PORTAL_ID AND MODULE.MODULE_CODE = 'WM' AND MODULE.IS_USAGE = 1 WHERE ITEM.REGIST_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1 AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND ITEM.MANUAL_TYPE != 'C' GROUP BY BOARD.PORTAL_ID

INSERT /* [KnowledgeMonitorStatistics_SqlMap.xml] collpack.knowledgemonitor.dao.KnowledgeMonitorStatistics.batchGatherSocialBlog */ INTO IKEP4_KN_STATISTICS ()
SELECT BOARD.PORTAL_ID PORTAL_ID , 'SB' MODULE_CODE , SYSDATE - 1 REGIST_DATE , NVL(SUM(DECODE(ITEM.READ_PERMISSION, 1, 1, 0)), 0) PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(ITEM.READ_PERMISSION, 1, 0, 1)), 0) CLOSED_DOC_COUNT , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'yyyymm') YEAR_MONTH , NEXT_DAY(TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1 - 7, '일') WEEK_START_DATE FROM IKEP4_SB_BD_ITEM ITEM JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER BOARD ON ITEM.REGISTER_ID = BOARD.USER_ID JOIN IKEP4_KN_MODULE MODULE ON MODULE.PORTAL_ID = BOARD.PORTAL_ID AND MODULE.MODULE_CODE = 'SB' AND MODULE.IS_USAGE = 1 WHERE ITEM.REGIST_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1 AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) GROUP BY BOARD.PORTAL_ID

INSERT /* [KnowledgeMonitorStatistics_SqlMap.xml] collpack.knowledgemonitor.dao.KnowledgeMonitorStatistics.batchGatherQnA */ INTO IKEP4_KN_STATISTICS ()
SELECT ITEM.PORTAL_ID PORTAL_ID , 'QA' MODULE_CODE , SYSDATE - 1 REGIST_DATE , NVL(COUNT(QNA_ID), 0) PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT , 0 CLOSED_DOC_COUNT , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'yyyymm') YEAR_MONTH , NEXT_DAY(TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1 - 7, '일') WEEK_START_DATE FROM IKEP4_QA_QNA ITEM JOIN IKEP4_KN_MODULE MODULE ON MODULE.PORTAL_ID = ITEM.PORTAL_ID AND MODULE.MODULE_CODE = 'QA' AND MODULE.IS_USAGE = 1 WHERE ITEM.REGIST_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1 AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND ITEM.ITEM_DELETE = 0 GROUP BY ITEM.PORTAL_ID

INSERT /* [KnowledgeMonitorStatistics_SqlMap.xml] collpack.knowledgemonitor.dao.KnowledgeMonitorStatistics.batchGatherForum */ INTO IKEP4_KN_STATISTICS ()
SELECT ITEM.PORTAL_ID PORTAL_ID , 'FR' MODULE_CODE , SYSDATE - 1 REGIST_DATE , NVL(COUNT(ITEM_ID), 0) PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT , 0 CLOSED_DOC_COUNT , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'yyyymm') YEAR_MONTH , NEXT_DAY(TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1 - 7, '일') WEEK_START_DATE FROM IKEP4_FR_ITEM ITEM JOIN IKEP4_KN_MODULE MODULE ON MODULE.PORTAL_ID = ITEM.PORTAL_ID AND MODULE.MODULE_CODE = 'FR' AND MODULE.IS_USAGE = 1 WHERE ITEM.REGIST_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1 AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) GROUP BY ITEM.PORTAL_ID

INSERT /* [KnowledgeMonitorStatistics_SqlMap.xml] collpack.knowledgemonitor.dao.KnowledgeMonitorStatistics.batchGatherIdeation */ INTO IKEP4_KN_STATISTICS ()
SELECT ITEM.PORTAL_ID PORTAL_ID , 'ID' MODULE_CODE , SYSDATE - 1 REGIST_DATE , NVL(COUNT(ITEM_ID), 0) PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT , 0 CLOSED_DOC_COUNT , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'yyyymm') YEAR_MONTH , NEXT_DAY(TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1 - 7, '일') WEEK_START_DATE FROM IKEP4_ID_IDEA ITEM JOIN IKEP4_KN_MODULE MODULE ON MODULE.PORTAL_ID = ITEM.PORTAL_ID AND MODULE.MODULE_CODE = 'ID' AND MODULE.IS_USAGE = 1 WHERE ITEM.REGIST_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1 AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) GROUP BY ITEM.PORTAL_ID

INSERT /* [KnowledgeMonitorStatistics_SqlMap.xml] collpack.knowledgemonitor.dao.KnowledgeMonitorStatistics.batchGatherCorVoca */ INTO IKEP4_KN_STATISTICS ()
SELECT ITEM.PORTAL_ID PORTAL_ID , 'CV' MODULE_CODE , SYSDATE - 1 REGIST_DATE , NVL(COUNT(WORD_ID), 0) PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT , 0 CLOSED_DOC_COUNT , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'yyyymm') YEAR_MONTH , NEXT_DAY(TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1 - 7, '일') WEEK_START_DATE FROM IKEP4_CV_WORD ITEM JOIN IKEP4_KN_MODULE MODULE ON MODULE.PORTAL_ID = ITEM.PORTAL_ID AND MODULE.MODULE_CODE = 'CV' AND MODULE.IS_USAGE = 1 WHERE ITEM.REGIST_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1 AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) GROUP BY ITEM.PORTAL_ID
sqlMap.select: SELECT /* [KnowledgeMonitorStatistics_SqlMap.xml] collpack.knowledgemonitor.dao.KnowledgeMonitorStatistics.listChartBySearchConditionPortlet */ SUBSTR(YEAR_MONTH,1,4)||'.'||SUBSTR(YEAR_MONTH,5,2) YMD , PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT, ALL_DOC_COUNT FROM ( SELECT YEAR_MONTH , SUM(PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT) PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT , SUM(PUBLIC_DOC_COUNT + CLOSED_DOC_COUNT) ALL_DOC_COUNT FROM IKEP4_KN_STATISTICS WHERE PORTAL_ID = #portalId# AND YEAR_MONTH BETWEEN #fromYear#||#fromMonth# AND #toYear#||#toMonth# GROUP BY YEAR_MONTH ) ORDER BY YEAR_MONTH
